alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 25 at 3:46AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lafourche, southeastern Jefferson and west central Plaquemines Parishes through 430 AM CST... At 346 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing funnel clouds 8 miles northeast of Leeville, or 13 miles southeast of Galliano, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If a funnel cloud briefly touches down, minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Isle. FUNNEL CLOUDS...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines
